“We wish to inform you that the Central Bank of the UAE has issued new regulations for Insurance Brokers, dated July 25, 2024. According to these regulations, Insurance Brokers are prohibited from collecting premiums under any circumstances. These regulations will come into effect on February 15, 2025. In compliance with these regulations, we will cease collecting premiums effective January 1, 2025. Henceforth, all premium payments should be made directly to the insurance providers as per the details mentioned in the insurance policy invoice”

 

 

 

 

 

Registered Name: Nasco M.E. Insurance Brokers LLC
